SEARCH
Package Persistence

Interface SqlDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MySqlDAO
public interface SqlDAO
This interface defines methods to interact with an SQL database for managing users, games, generators, and power-ups.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      Connection connect() throws PersistenceException
      Establishes a connection with the database.
      Returns:
      The established connection.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • disconnect

      void disconnect() throws PersistenceException
      Closes a previously established connection with the database.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • createUser

      void createUser(String userName, String mail, String password) throws PersistenceException
      Creates a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the new user.
      mail - The email of the new user.
      password - The password of the new user.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • verifyUserCredentialsUsername

      boolean verifyUserCredentialsUsername(String userName, String password) throws PersistenceException
      Verifies the credentials of a user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • verifyUserCredentialsEmail

      boolean verifyUserCredentialsEmail(String mail, String password) throws PersistenceException
      Verifies the credentials of a user.
      Parameters:
      mail - The mail of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • getRecoverPassword

      String getRecoverPassword(String userName, String mail) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves the password of the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user.
      mail - The email of the user.
      Returns:
      The password as a String if the credentials are valid, null otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • updateUser

      boolean updateUser(String userName, String newMail, String newPassword) throws PersistenceException
      Updates the information of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to be updated.
      newMail - The new email of the user.
      newPassword - The new password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is updated successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllUsers

      ArrayList<String> readAllUsers() throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all the userNames from the database.
      Returns:
      A list with all the userNames from the database.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(String userName) throws PersistenceException
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to be deleted.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • createGame

      boolean createGame(String userName, String gameName) throws PersistenceException
      Starts a new game for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user starting the game.
      gameName - The name of the new game.
      Returns:
      true if the game is started successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • doesGameNameExistsForUser

      boolean doesGameNameExistsForUser(String userName, String gameName) throws PersistenceException
      Verifies if the game's name already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username to whom it will be verified if the game's name exists.
      gameName - Game's name which needs to be verified.
      Returns:
      true if game's name already exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • endGameCurrentGame

      void endGameCurrentGame(String userName) throws PersistenceException
      Ends the current game for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user ending the game.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readCurrentGame

      Game readCurrentGame(String userName) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves the current game for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user whose current game is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The current game of the specified user.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readGame

      Game readGame(String gameName) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves the game with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The game with the specified name.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllGamesFromUser

      ArrayList<Game> readAllGamesFromUser(String userName) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all games associated with the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user whose games are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all games associated with the specified user.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllGames

      ArrayList<Game> readAllGames() throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all games stored in the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all games stored in the database.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • updateGame

      void updateGame(Game game) throws PersistenceException
      Updates the information of the specified game in the database.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object containing the updated information.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • deleteGame

      boolean deleteGame(String gameName) throws PersistenceException
      Deletes the game with the specified name from the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the game is deleted successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • doesGeneratorTypeExistsForGame

      boolean doesGeneratorTypeExistsForGame(String gameName, String generatorsType) throws PersistenceException
      Checks if a generator type exists for a given game in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to check for the generator type.
      generatorsType - The type of generator to check for.
      Returns:
      true if the generator type exists for the game, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readGeneratorOnCurrentGame

      Generator readGeneratorOnCurrentGame(String userName, String generatorType) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves the generator of the specified type for the current game of the given user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user whose current game's generator is to be retrieved.
      generatorType - The type of generator to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The generator of the specified type for the current game of the given user.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllGeneratorFromGame

      ArrayList<Generator> readAllGeneratorFromGame(String gameName) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all generators associated with the specified game.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game whose generators are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all generators associated with the specified game.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllGenerators

      ArrayList<Generator> readAllGenerators() throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all generators stored in the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all generators stored in the database.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • updateGenerator

      void updateGenerator(String gameName, Generator generator) throws PersistenceException
      Updates the information of the specified generator in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to which the generator belongs.
      generator - The generator object containing the updated information.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • deleteGenerator

      boolean deleteGenerator(String gameName, String generatorType) throws PersistenceException
      Deletes the specified generator from the specified game in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game from which the generator is to be deleted.
      generatorType - The generator to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the generator is deleted successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • doesPowerUpTypeExistsForGame

      boolean doesPowerUpTypeExistsForGame(String gameName, String powerUpName) throws PersistenceException
      Checks if a power-up type exists for a specific game in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to check.
      powerUpName - The name of the power-up type to check.
      Returns:
      True if the power-up type exists for the game, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readPowerUpOnCurrentGame

      PowerUp readPowerUpOnCurrentGame(String userName, String powerUpName) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves the power-up of the specified type for the current game of the given user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user whose current game's power-up is to be retrieved.
      powerUpName - The type of power-up to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The power-up of the specified type for the current game of the given user.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllPowerUpFromGame

      ArrayList<PowerUp> readAllPowerUpFromGame(String gameName) throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all power-ups associated with the specified game.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game whose power-ups are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all power-ups associated with the specified game.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • readAllPowerUps

      ArrayList<PowerUp> readAllPowerUps() throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all power-ups stored in the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all power-ups stored in the database.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • updatePowerUp

      boolean updatePowerUp(String gameName, PowerUp powerUp) throws PersistenceException
      Updates the information of the specified power-up in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to which the power-up belongs.
      powerUp - The power-up object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the power-up is updated successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • updatePowerUpPurchased

      void updatePowerUpPurchased(String gameName, PowerUp powerUp) throws PersistenceException
      Updates the purchased field of the specified power-up in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to which the power-up belongs.
      powerUp - The power-up object containing the updated information.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.

    • deletePowerUp

      boolean deletePowerUp(String gameName, String powerUpName) throws PersistenceException
      Deletes the specified power-up from the specified game in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game from which the power-up is to be deleted.
      powerUpName - The power-up to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the power-up is deleted successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs while executing the operation in the database.
